anatomicalLocation.controlled_vocab: Any term from a suitable ontology such as [Foundational Model of Anatomy Ontology](http://www.ontobee.org/ontology/FMA), [EMAPA](http://www.ontobee.org/ontology/EMAPA),

valueReference.controlled_vocab: Any term from a suitable ontology such as [Human Phenotype Ontology](http://www.ontobee.org/ontology/HP),  [Mammalian Phenotype Ontology](http://www.ontobee.org/ontology/MP), [Plant Phenotype Ontology](http://www.ontobee.org/ontology/flopo)
